# GitHub Configuration

This directory contains GitHub-specific configuration:

## Files

- **`dependabot.yml`**: Automated dependency updates (compatible with uv via pyproject.toml)
- **`QUICK_REFERENCE.md`**: Daily development commands and troubleshooting

## Workflows

- **`ci.yml`**: Continuous integration (lint, test, validate)
- **`release.yml`**: Automated releases to PyPI on version tags
- **`coverage.yml`**: Code coverage tracking with Codecov
- **`dependencies.yml`**: Weekly security and outdated package checks

See `QUICK_REFERENCE.md` for usage instructions.
